com.kissmetrics.sdk

Class KISSmetricsAPI

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.kissmetrics.sdk.KISSmetricsAPI

  • public final class KISSmetricsAPI
extends java.lang.Object
    KISSmetricsAPI Public API for sending identities, events and properties to KISSmetrics from Android applications. Compatible with Android 2.1+

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  KISSmetricsAPI.RecordCondition 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void alias(java.lang.String alias, java.lang.String identity)
      Applies an alias to an identity
      void autoRecordInstalls()
      Automatically records the following events "Installed App" "Updated App"
      void autoSetAppProperties()
      Automatically collects and sets the following applcation properties as distinct properties: "App Version" : (1.0) aka versionName "App Build" : (10) aka versionCode
      void autoSetHardwareProperties()
      Automatically collects and sets the following hardware properties as distinct properties: "Device Manufacturer" : (Asus) "Device Model" : (Nexus 7) "System Name" : (Android) "System Version" : (4.4)
      void clearIdentity()
      Sets a new random identity that isn't aliased or associated with a previous identity.
      void identify(java.lang.String identity)
      Applies an identity to the user.
      java.lang.String identity()
      This getter does not lock on the Archiver instance to prevent locking of an application's main thread.

      Convenience method for recording an event without properties.

      Records an event per identity or install depending on the RecordCondition that's passed.
      void record(java.lang.String name, KISSmetricsAPI.RecordCondition condition)
      Convenience method for recording an event on a RecordCondition without properties.
      void recordEvent(java.lang.String name, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> properties)
      Deprecated. 
      use record(String name, HashMap properties) instead. 'recordEvent' method name has been changed to 'record' for consistency across our various APIs. Records an event with optional properties.
      void recordOnce(java.lang.String name)
      Deprecated. 
      use record(String name, HashMap properties), RecordCondition condition instead. 'recordOnce' would only restrict the recording of events per identity. A more flexible solution was needed to allow recording of events once per installation or identity.
      void set(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> properties)
      Sets one or more properties.
      void setDistinct(java.lang.String propertyName, java.lang.String value)
      Sets a single property if the value is different from the last set value.
      void setProperties(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> properties)
      Deprecated. 
      use set(HashMap properties) instead. 'setProperties' method name has been changed to 'set' for consistency across our various APIs.
      static KISSmetricsAPI sharedAPI() 
      static KISSmetricsAPI sharedAPI(java.lang.String productKey, android.content.Context applicationContext)
      Initializes and/or returns the KISSmetricsAPI singleton instance.
      static KISSmetricsAPI sharedAPI(java.lang.String apiKey, android.content.Context context, boolean secure)
      Deprecated. 
      use sharedAPI(String apiKey) instead. All requests are now made over https. secure(boolean) is ignored. Initializes and/or returns the KISSmetricsAPI singleton instance.

    • Method Detail

      • sharedAPI

        public static KISSmetricsAPI sharedAPI(java.lang.String productKey,
                       android.content.Context applicationContext)
        Initializes and/or returns the KISSmetricsAPI singleton instance. This method must be called before making any other calls.
        Parameters:
        productKey - KISSmetrics product key.
        applicationContext - Android application context.
        Returns:
        KISSmetricsAPI singleton instance.

      • sharedAPI

        public static KISSmetricsAPI sharedAPI()
        Returns:
        KISSmetricsAPI singleton instance.

        Applies an identity to the user.
        Parameters:
        identity - user identity

      • identity

        public java.lang.String identity()
        This getter does not lock on the Archiver instance to prevent locking of an application's main thread. All writes to identity lock on the singleton instance of sharedArchiver.
        Returns:
        Last provided identity string for the current user

      • record

        properties - Event properties or null

      • record

        public void record(java.lang.String name)
        Convenience method for recording an event without properties.
        Parameters:
        name - Event name

      • record

        public void record(java.lang.String name,
          java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> properties,
          KISSmetricsAPI.RecordCondition condition)
        Records an event per identity or install depending on the RecordCondition that's passed.
        Parameters:
        name - Event name
        properties - Event properties or null
        condition - RecordCondition (RecordOncePerInstall, RecordOncePerIdentity). - Using RecordOncePerInstall: The event will only be recorded once during the lifetime of the application's installation. If the event has already been recorded, any properties passed will also be ignored. - Using RecordOncePerIdentity: The event will only be recorded once until the identity changes or is cleared via clearIdentity. If the event has already been recorded, any properties passed will also be ignored.

      • record

        public void record(java.lang.String name,
          KISSmetricsAPI.RecordCondition condition)
        Convenience method for recording an event on a RecordCondition without properties.
        Parameters:
        name - Event name
        condition - RecordCondition (RecordOncePerInstall, RecordOncePerIdentity). - Using RecordOncePerInstall: The event will only be recorded once during the lifetime of the application's installation. If the event has already been recorded, any properties passed will also be ignored. - Using RecordOncePerIdentity: The event will only be recorded once until the identity changes or is cleared via clearIdentity. If the event has already been recorded, any properties passed will also be ignored.

        public void set(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> properties)
        Sets one or more properties.
        Parameters:
        properties - User properties

      • verificationComplete

        public void verificationComplete(boolean success,
                        boolean doTrack,
                        java.lang.String baseUrl,
                        long expirationDate)
        VerificationDelegateInterface methods
        Parameters:
        success - True for acceptable query response codes.
        doTrack - True of the tracking is allowed for the provided KM Product key.
        baseUrl - Tracking endpoint URL
        expirationDate - Unix timestamp in milliseconds from now.

      • sharedAPI

        @Deprecated
public static KISSmetricsAPI sharedAPI(java.lang.String apiKey,
                                  android.content.Context context,
                                  boolean secure)
        Deprecated. use sharedAPI(String apiKey) instead. All requests are now made over https. secure(boolean) is ignored. Initializes and/or returns the KISSmetricsAPI singleton instance.
        Parameters:
        apiKey - KISSmetrics product key
        context - Android application context
        secure - !Ignored!
        Returns:
        singleton instance of the KISSmeticsAPI

      • recordEvent

        @Deprecated
public void recordEvent(java.lang.String name,
                          java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> properties)
        Deprecated. use record(String name, HashMap properties) instead. 'recordEvent' method name has been changed to 'record' for consistency across our various APIs. Records an event with optional properties.
        Parameters:
        name - Event name
        properties - Event properties or null

      • recordOnce

        @Deprecated
public void recordOnce(java.lang.String name)
        Deprecated. use record(String name, HashMap properties), RecordCondition condition instead. 'recordOnce' would only restrict the recording of events per identity. A more flexible solution was needed to allow recording of events once per installation or identity.
        Parameters:
        name - Event name

      • setProperties

        @Deprecated
public void setProperties(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> properties)
        Deprecated. use set(HashMap properties) instead. 'setProperties' method name has been changed to 'set' for consistency across our various APIs.
        Parameters:
        properties - User properties
